events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I want to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for handling the refund process.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and any photos of the incorrect item you received?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached pictures of the wrong item that was sent to me.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and you should receive the money within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate you handling this so fast.
Your refund has been processed successfully. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if everything is satisfactory.
Since we haven’t heard back, we’ll consider this case resolved and close it. Thank you for contacting support.
